name: Dancing Car: Tap Tap EDM Music
name_original: Dancing Car: Tap Tap EDM Music
description:
Feel the beat with addictive music game and enjoy the fascinating songs!
Various types of song, which are updated every week: Pop, Classic, EDM, Rock, Hiphop, and more

Easy to play:
- Tap tap to move and feel the beat
- Avoid cars on the opposite side

Music game feature:
- Enjoy many the fascinating songs
- Music moods: Action, Calm, Chill, Dance, Deep, Emotional...
- Various & beautiful maps: city, sea, desert, forest...
- Many modes: day-night, raining, snow...
- Unique cars

Music copyright belongs to edmroyaltyfree.net
